definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: I will take an end-of-term exam this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 这周五我要进行期末考试。

sentences.english: He failed in the end-of-term exam.
I had done a better job in the final examination!
sentences.chinese: 我多么希望在期末考试时考出好成绩。

sentences.english: Young couple be smooching all over campus after finishing finals.
sentences.chinese: 期末考结束后，年轻爱侣在校园各处热烈拥吻。

sentences.english: But I did bad in the Final Exam.
sentences.chinese: 但我却在期末考试中考砸了。

sentences.english: He's boning up for his finals.
sentences.chinese: 他为应付期末考试而临阵磨枪。

sentences.english: I have to cram for finals next week. ;
sentences.chinese: 我必须临阵磨枪以准备下周的期末考试。

sentences.english: The end of term examinations and sounded the war drum.
sentences.chinese: 期末考试的战鼓又敲响了。

sentences.english: He was working against the clock to try to finish studying before the final exam.
sentences.chinese: 他分秒必争，试着在期末考前把书念完。

sentences.english: John felt rather blue because he had not done as well on his final exams as he had expected to.
sentences.chinese: 约翰很担忧，因为他的期末考未如他所预期的那么好。

sentences.english: It was the first night of Chanukah and the night before Ellie's last final.
sentences.chinese: 那是光明节的第一个晚上，也是艾莉期末考试的前夜。

sentences.english: I had to bone up on my Latin verbs before the final exam .
sentences.chinese: 期末考试前我得苦攻一下我的拉丁语动词。

sentences.english: There will be two 90-minute quizzes and a 3-hour final exam.
sentences.chinese: 有两个90分钟的测验和一个3小时的期末考试。

sentences.english: I'm lucky that I didn't miss my final exam after having 30 minutes of unprotected sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我真走运，睡了30分钟的回笼觉还没错过期末考试。

sentences.english: I hope I can do even better on my finals.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我可以在期末考时表现得更好。

definition: variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
entrance exam for senior middle school
to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
